CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(NOT(ISBLANK(EnAttenteDDT2_Stamp__c )),NOT(ISBLANK( EnAttenteLeCapitaine_Stamp__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(EnAttenteLecapitaineRetourAchat_Stamp__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(EnAttenteLecapitaineServiceAchat_Stamp__c ))) , ( (EnAttenteDDT2_Stamp__c - EnAttenteLeCapitaine_Stamp__c)-(EnAttenteLecapitaineRetourAchat_Stamp__c - EnAttenteLecapitaineServiceAchat_Stamp__c ) )*24 , if( AND((ISBLANK(EnAttenteLecapitaineRetourAchat_Stamp__c)),(ISBLANK(EnAttenteLecapitaineServiceAchat_Stamp__c ))) , (EnAttenteDDT2_Stamp__c - EnAttenteLeCapitaine_Stamp__c)*24 , null ))
CustomField.label: Dur√©e de traitement Lecapitaine
